author: Amy Woodyatt, CNN
title: Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni, 75, releases indoor workout video to keep citizens at home
description: As countries around the world struggle to keep citizens inside to stop the spread of Covid-19, Uganda's president, Yoweri Museveni, is trying something a bit different.
content:
(CNN)As countries around the world struggle to keep citizens inside to stop the spread of Covid-19, Uganda's president, Yoweri Museveni, is trying something a bit different.
In a bid to encourage Ugandans to stay home during the country's lockdown, the 75-ye… [+1300 chars]
